00147 int nfs_Fsstat( nfs_arg_t         * parg,    
00148                 exportlist_t      * pexport, 
00149                 fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00150                 cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00151                 hash_table_t      * ht,
00152                 struct svc_req    * preq,    
00153                 nfs_res_t         * pres )   
00154 {
00155         static char  __attribute__(( __unused__ ))   funcName[] = "nfs_Fsstat";
00156  
00157   fsal_staticfsinfo_t   staticinfo ;
00158   fsal_dynamicfsinfo_t  dynamicinfo ;
00159   cache_inode_status_t  cache_status ;
00160   cache_entry_t       * pentry = NULL ;
00161   fsal_attrib_list_t    attr;
00162   int                   rc = 0 ;
00163   
00164         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00165         {
00166                 /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00167                 pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resfail.obj_attributes.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00168         }
00169 
00170         /* convert file handle to vnode */      
00171   if( ( pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00172                                      &(parg->arg_lookup2.dir), 
00173                                      &(parg->arg_lookup3.what.dir),
00174                                      NULL,
00175                                      &(pres->res_statfs2.status),
00176                                      &(pres->res_fsstat3.status),
00177                                      NULL,
00178                                      NULL, 
00179                                      pcontext, 
00180                                      pclient, 
00181                                      ht, 
00182                                      &rc ) ) == NULL )
00183     {
00184       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00185       /* return NFS_REQ_DROP ; */
00186       return rc ;
00187     }
00188 
00189         /* Get statistics and convert from cache */
00190   
00191   if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_statfs( pentry, 
00192                                            &staticinfo, 
00193                                            &dynamicinfo, 
00194                                            pcontext,
00195                                            &cache_status ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00196     {
00197       /* This call is costless, the pentry was cached during call to nfs_FhandleToCache */
00198       if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_getattr( pentry,
00199                                                 &attr, 
00200                                                 ht,
00201                                                 pclient, pcontext,
00202                                                 &cache_status ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00203         {     
00204 #ifdef  _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00205           printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> dynamicinfo.total_bytes = %llu dynamicinfo.free_bytes = %llu dynamicinfo.avail_bytes = %llu\n", 
00206                   dynamicinfo.total_bytes,  dynamicinfo.free_bytes,  dynamicinfo.avail_bytes ) ;
00207           printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> dynamicinfo.total_files = %llu dynamicinfo.free_files = %llu dynamicinfo.avail_files = %llu\n", 
00208                   dynamicinfo.total_files,  dynamicinfo.free_files,  dynamicinfo.avail_files ) ;
00209 #endif               
00210           switch (preq->rq_vers)
00211             {
00212             case NFS_V2:
00213               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.tsize  = NFS2_MAXDATA;
00214               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bsize  = DEV_BSIZE ;
00215               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.blocks = dynamicinfo.total_bytes / DEV_BSIZE ;
00216               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bfree  = dynamicinfo.free_bytes  / DEV_BSIZE ;
00217               pres->res_statfs2.STATFS2res_u.info.bavail = dynamicinfo.avail_bytes / DEV_BSIZE ;
00218               pres->res_statfs2.status = NFS_OK;
00219               break;
00220               
00221             case NFS_V3:
00222               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport,
00223                                  pentry, 
00224                                  &attr,
00225                                  &(pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.obj_attributes) );
00226               
00227               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tbytes = dynamicinfo.total_bytes;
00228               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.fbytes = dynamicinfo.free_bytes;
00229               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.abytes = dynamicinfo.avail_bytes;
00230               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tfiles = dynamicinfo.total_files;
00231               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.ffiles = dynamicinfo.free_files ;
00232               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.afiles = dynamicinfo.avail_files;
00233               pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.invarsec = 0;        /* volatile FS */
00234               pres->res_fsstat3.status = NFS3_OK;
00235 
00236 #ifdef  _DEBUG_NFSPROTO
00237               printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> tbytes=%llu fbytes=%llu abytes=%llu\n", 
00238                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tbytes,
00239                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.fbytes,
00240                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.abytes ) ;
00241               
00242               printf( "-- nfs_Fsstat --> tfiles=%llu fffiles=%llu afiles=%llu\n", 
00243                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.tfiles, 
00244                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.ffiles, 
00245                       pres->res_fsstat3.FSSTAT3res_u.resok.afiles ) ;
00246 #endif           
00247 
00248               break;
00249 
00250             }
00251           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00252         }
00253     }
00254   
00255         /* At this point we met an error */
00256         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status) )
00257                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00258 
00259         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00260                        preq->rq_vers, 
00261                        cache_status,
00262                        &pres->res_statfs2.status,
00263                        &pres->res_fsstat3.status,
00264                        NULL, NULL,
00265                        NULL, NULL, NULL,
00266                        NULL, NULL, NULL);
00267   
00268         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00269 } /* nfs_Fsstat */
00270 
00279 void nfs_Fsstat_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00280 {
00281   /* Nothing to do here */
00282   return ;
00283 } /* nfs_Fsstat_Free */
